title: Capitology, LLC Recalls Ineligible Pork Chicharrones Products Imported from Honduras
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 23, 2023 - Capitology, LLC, the importer of record located in Charlotte, N.C., is recalling approximately 4,679 pounds of pork chicharrones products. The products were imported from Honduras, a country ineligible to export pork products to the United States, the U.S. Department of...
impacted_products: 5.3-oz. foil pouch packages containing "Rica Sula TAJADITAS con CHICHARRON Platanos Con Chicharron."
